Reviews.Title: “Central, clean and full breakfast”
Reviews.Author: orangetree76
Reviews.Content: Location is easy to reach both historical peninsula and Taksim and airport. Price might be low but our room esp bathroom was clean and newly renovated. Breakfast is open buffeet so this is nice.Rooms are silent unlike other hotels in the district. We are happy with our stay and definetely we can stay again

Reviews.Title: “Poor and old hotel”
Reviews.Author: fabiobrsp
Reviews.Content: We stayed for only one night in this hotel paid by the airline company, as our transit time for the connecting flight would be of around 14 hours (several other guests also appeared to be airline travelers, as our ride back to the airport was full of passengers). Not understanding a word in Turkish, I was hoping that what I heard from the airline agent was something like "Four Seasons". Unfortunately, it was only the "All" Seasons, a very simple hotel, with dated furniture and tiny rooms (the elevator also was really tiny and slow). Not finding instructions to dial to the front desk, I went down in person to ask for a wake-up call at 6:30 am. The guy answered that they "usually call at 7 am", but I insisted to be called at 6:30 am. He wrote my request in a form and, guess what, no wake-up call at 6:30 on next morning. They only called at 7 am. The included breakfast is not so bad if compared to the rest of the hotel, but this is probably because we ate there once. The only available juice was not fresh, and it was made from artificial fruit powder. Bread was available in several options. As per the folder available in the room, if I recall, the hotel is ten-years old but appears to be older, due to the worn out furniture, carpet and other appliances in the room (except for a small flat screen TV).

Reviews.Title: “Carefully with these guys”
Reviews.Author: Lewiswalker
Reviews.Content: The kindness of the hotel staff is the same as in any street in New York . They are confident that , customer will come , no metter what they will do . We reserved an appartment . They put is in a 3 bed appartment with extra bed. At the check out they charged me at the same price as I was staying in an appartment . They told me I was lucky they did not charge me with the official rates , which were with 50% higher. The receptionist did not let me to talk with the hotel manager. Definitelly is not a four star hotel . The location is excelent. If you like to argue and you like all kind of surprises , than you can stay at this hotel. Don't trust your internet reservation !!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Awful Management”
Reviews.Author: hotelmaster22
Reviews.Content: Everything is pretty good. The breakfast is decent. The hotel is clean. Location could be better. You need to take a taxi or the metro system in order to get to most of the tourist sites like the Blue Mosque and Sultanahmet. The only problem with this hotel is the management. DO NOT TRUST THEM. They try to sell you all of their tours to take your money, and they actually team up to try and screw you over. If you do not sign up and spend money for their tours, they'll pretty much treat you like crap.

Reviews.Title: “Not so good”
Reviews.Author: mhajizamani
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very near to Tram station (2 min walking). the breakfast was good but simple. car parking in front of hotel was free. Air Conditioners almost didn't work and the lobby, rooms, corridors are hot during the day. Internet in the rooms are very weak, but in the lobby it is good. I recommend it if you like to stay in hotel just in the nights. in the daytime it is like hell! the price is good, although it is not so cheap.

Reviews.Title: “Good Staff”
Reviews.Author: Xfive_L
Reviews.Content: This hotel was good. The staff were extremely helpful and breakfast was always nice. If I need to stay in the Topkapi area of Istanbul again, I'll stay in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Aviodable”
Reviews.Author: sandyh2001in
Reviews.Content: There were many things that didnt work for me. First off, the reception staff were boorish and knew nothing about hospitality and did nothing to make me feel welcome. Having said that, the junior staffs like cleaners and bell boys were far better and well behaved. The location is OK but no match for Sultanahmet, actually we quickly realized that there was no point staying anywhere other than Sultanahmet as thats where all the action is in Istanbul. The air conditioning didnt work in the middle of May and things got unbearable in the afternoons. Repeated requests (to the same rude receptionist) fell on deaf ears. Avoid it and save your holiday good mood.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: jsangiuliano
Reviews.Content: This hotel is constantly overbooked, the staff is absolutely unorganized, and extremely rude. Not only did they try to tell me that both their internet and air conditioning were working fine (neither was), but they did so in a matter that was rude and condescending. They also let me wait in the lobby for 5 hours until EXACTLY 12:00 check-in, saying that no rooms were available until exactly that time (as I see other customers checking in and checking out during this entire time). They lost my reservation,

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful introduction to Turkey!”
Reviews.Author: CidermanNewZealand
Reviews.Content: Almost one year ago! We look back on our time in Turkey and at this hotel, with great affection. Helpful and smiling staff, a comfortable room and access to interesting places . Superb buffet breakfasts.

Reviews.Title: “Worse than the ten plagues!! Far worse!!! Stay away from this hole!”
Reviews.Author: chaimdan
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review from the All Seasons Hotel. I arrived early this morning, and it has been absolutely horrendous! AVOID AT ALL COSTS! YOU ARE BETTER OFF SLEEPING ON A PARK BENCH THAN SLEEPING HERE!! (I'm not kidding!) Upon arriving in my tiny triple room I noticed that the air-conditioning wasn't working. I called the front desk 3 times and waited over an hour until someone finally came to look at it.. They came with a FAN!! Apparently air-conditioning doesn't work during the day, "it rests from the night".. Are they kidding?! This is Istanbul!! IT gets quite hot during the day!! but no AC! About an hour later I try using the washroom for the first time, BUT THERE IS NO WATER! The toilette doesn't flush and sink and shower don't work. I call down, this time two people come up and say the water should be back on in an hour! Seeing that we had two small children and that it was hot like the sahara dessert in our room they offered to bring us some drinking water (which is not provided in the rooms...) They brought a large bottle which was refilled with tap water from downstairs (the cap was not sealed and water was literally up to the top of the cap). The room itself is very small (see pics) and run down, the carpet is hanging loose from the floor, TV is the size of an old computer monitor with only one english channel (BBC), bathroom is old, shower has black stains all over.. SO HOW DID I END UP HERE?! I was on transit through Istanbul and Turkish Air gives free accommodations. I called before hand to find out what type of hotels they offer, and they said 4-5*, I asked them to name one of the hotels and they said the Marriott, so I figured I was good... What a horrible mistake. I have already booked a room on my way back at the Courtyard airport. I have travelled extensively over the years and did not have any high expectations. Generally, regardless of how bad a room is, if there is good AC and a clean bathroom I'm happy. This place had none of that! I think tripadvisor should remove the TOP VALUE logo from this property as it's hardly got ANY value!

Reviews.Title: “The worst horrible hotel of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Turkishdelight2010
Reviews.Content: In may 2010, I stayed at this hotel for 1 week and I have 1 conclusion, which is = this is the most horrible hotel in Istanbul, if not, in the world! If you want to enjoy your stay in Istanbul please avoid this place. Why?, because: 1) The staff members, especially at the reception, are amateurs, very rude and they even cursed at me, before I left the hotel. 2) Every room has airco, but they refuse to turn it on (save money) 3) Their website describes that the rooms have insulated windows and walls against sound. This is not true, because you can still hear the traffic when you close the windows, so you can't sleep comfortably 4) The view of the hotel is horrible, because all you can see is a hotel in front of you 5) The website describes that every room has satellite TV. Well I had 4 channels, but without sound. 6) Do not accept their airport transfer. They ask double price, take a bus or arrange a taxi at the airport, which will go for less. 7) For all the activities (sauna, playroom, etc) you have to pay additionally 8) Their website describes that it has WiFi, but the most of the time the internet connection is bad, not working. 9) Too many reasons to name............ So again, please avoid this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “The All Seasons Hotel services, hotel and room concept and location are excellent.”
Reviews.Author: TASS61
Reviews.Content: The All Seasons Hotel services, hotel and room concept and location are excellent.Hotel location location behind the historical places.

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: lilynm
Reviews.Content: I went to Istanbul with a tourists group,our travel agent was booking for us in the all Seasons hotel,we stayed there for nine days.The rooms were tidy and clean,but the bathroom is small.The breakfast was very good.The hotel location is very good,it is withen minuts of walking from two main streets( Millet Gaddesi and Adnan Menderes Bulvari),so I never face a trouble in transportation.The staff were helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay At All Seasons It Is Aweful”
Reviews.Author: Sallysilkroadreview
Reviews.Content: This hotel makes any hostel look like a luxury hotel. It is filthy, the bathrooms smell. This isn't a four star hotel, it is a -1 star hotel. And the crazy thing is that it is expensive. DO NOT STAY HERE!!! The manager at the front desk is rude. We were going to check out , but had to stay the first night, and when we asked for a map of Istanbul they wanted to charge us $10 USD. If you want to save money, go stay in a hostel. If you want a nice hotel, don't stay here.

Reviews.Title: “All Seasons Hotel in Istanbul made my stay in Turkey unforgettable”
Reviews.Author: ValkyrieManila
Reviews.Content: I went to Istanbul late last year, and before going I asked a Turkish friend if he knew of a good yet reasonably-priced hotel where I can stay for 5 days. My friend suggested booking a room with All Seasons Hotel since he just lived near the place and could say that that hotel was good. Well, my friend wasn't lying. The hotel was very nice, the staff were all very friendly and courteous and were very professional. The room price was ok, just right for my tight budget and the food was good Turkish cuisine.

Reviews.Title: “thanks!!”
Reviews.Author: pelijan99
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel only one night.I was coming from Asia and Ä± was going to the USA so Ä± need to stay a hotel which are cheap, close to airport and of course comfortable. Hotel gave me whole this.Reception staf was very helpfull, breakfast was good.and they arannged me cheap transport to go to airport too.

HotelInfo.Name: All Seasons Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Molla Gurani Cad. Emin Ali Yesim Sk. | No:5 Findikzade, Istanbul 34270, Turkey
